name: Nowhere New - Demo
description:
nowhere_new (demo)

After crash-landing on a mysterious planet, novice engineer Nova Collins must unravel the secrets of a town’s messy past in order to escape it. Talk, explore, and reason your way through this enigmatic place, but beware: ideas here manifest as things that can be traded and lost, so don’t lose too much of yourself along the way...

This is a Demo for our upcoming game Nowhere New, due to release in June of 2020

Please follow our Twitter @nowhere_new

And visit our Website
